name: Flappy Pipes (Marangon Productions)
description:
Control the pipes to stop them from colliding with the bird!!!

CONTROLS:

Up Arrow/Down Arrow: Move the pipe

Left Arrow/Right Arrow: Select pipe

This game was maded as a challenge to myself, using only the C# language and the System.Drawing namespace, without the use of a game engine or a game-dev specific library like Raylib.
